desc: Seed used by engine for RNG. Generated automatically at new game.
Internal to engine. Do not modify using game_var.
Can be set to the nid of your desired next level.
Can be set to the nid of the overworld to go to next.
# of turnwheel uses left in level. Automatically sets to max upon winning level.
Maximum number of turnwheel uses/level. Defaults to -1 (infinite).
Player has access to convoy when set to True. (Default False)
Player has access to turnwheel when set to True. (Default False)
Player can access support mechanics when True. (Default False)
0=off, 1=fatigued units can't be deployed, 2=fatigue/rested status, 3=your custom implementation
Player can access market from prep screen when True. (Default False)
Tracks NID of music in preps. Does not need to be set manually.
Player can access market from base screen when True. (Default False)
Tracks NID of background in base. Does not need to be set manually.
Tracks NID of music in base. Does not need to be set manually.
Number of milliseconds phase music takes to fade in. Default 400.
Holds the most recent choice made by the player using choice event.
Flag for chapter 1 if bones ran away
Timer for chapter 1 for bones getting ready to leave.
Villagers saved during chapter 2 by escorting to tavern
Villagers who died during chapter 2 during escort
Schuri's opinion of MC (>0 in order to use in final)
Senya's opinion of MC(>0 in order to use in final)
Did you complete the guard rescue?
Did you talk to Aesc yet
Stores random variable to check if an item should be dropped.
Was a village destroyed during chapter 1?
Did MC take the tome in CH3?
If Lilith's HP has been reduced to 0 a second time
Was the mentor killed
